alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bourbon, northern Crawford and northern Vernon Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 145 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Adrian to 6 miles southeast of Hume to near Redfield to 6 miles southwest of Chanute. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nevada, Fort Scott, Girard, Marmaton, Bronson, Arcadia, Uniontown, Schell City, Walnut, Fulton, Redfield, Hepler, Moundville, Richards, Mapleton, Deerfield, Metz, Stotesbury, Harding and Petersburg. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 92 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas...and southwestern and west central Missouri.
